Art Exhibitions -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Jamil Malaeb : "Painting Exhibition"[Painting reproduced on poster by] G. Molaeb. Launching 7 April 1993, continues till 28 April 1993. Ajial for Plastic Arts, Abdel Aziz street. Beirut. Nakhal for printing and advertising.
